blocked-users.empty: So far, you have not blocked anybody.

explanation.closing: This should be sufficient for now so that blocked users can no longer bother you.
explanation.commenting-disabled: Commenting is not possible at this time on this post.
explanation.commenting-explanation: This can happen for several reasons, please see our
explanation.intro: If another user has been blocked by you, this is what happens:
explanation.notifications: Blocked users will no longer receive notifications if they mention each other.
explanation.their-perspective: Vice versa: The blocked person will also no longer be able to interact with your contributions.
explanation.your-perspective: You will no longer be able to interact with their contributions.

blocked-users.how-to: You can block other users on their profile page via the content menu.
blocked-users.name: Blocked users

deleteUserAccount.infoAdmin: All contributions and comments of the user will be deleted additionally!
